channel.title: adblock on uweb browser: unlimited power
channel.description: Recent content in adblock on uweb browser: unlimited power

item.title: Hosts files
item.description: The enhanced hosts files "hosts" and "default.hosts" take effect with the setting option "use hosts". hosts The enhanced file "hosts" defines IP addresses/attributes for domains. Each line has the following format: [[IP address][attributes]][single space][domain name] where "[[IP address][attributes]]" could be: ipv4 address such as: 172.67.157.211 torapp.eu.org ipv6 address, Ex.: [2606:4700:3037::6815:8c3] torapp.eu.org empty, that would lift all server-imposed limitations. Ex.: [single space]gitee.com which will make all git repositories on the domain visitable as websites with raw file access url.
